new: (a b c : ℝ) (ha : 0 < a) (hb : 0 < b) (hc : 0 < c) (habc : a * b * c = 1) : a + b + c ≥ 3 := by

import Mathlib
import Aesop
set_option maxHeartbeats 0
open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat
theorem AM_GM_inequality (a b c : ℝ) (ha : 0 < a) (hb : 0 < b) (hc : 0 < c) (habc : a * b * c = 1) : a + b + c ≥ 3 := by
  have h₁ : a + b + c ≥ 3 * (1 : ℝ) := by
    nlinarith [sq_nonneg (a - b), sq_nonneg (a - c), sq_nonneg (b - c),
      mul_self_nonneg (a + b + c)]
  linarith

theorem AM_GM_inequality_four (a b c d : ℝ) : a ^ 4 + b ^ 4 + c ^ 4 + d ^ 4 ≥ 4 * a * b * c * d := by
  nlinarith [sq_nonneg (a - b), sq_nonneg (a - c), sq_nonneg (a - d),
    sq_nonneg (b - c), sq_nonneg (b - d), sq_nonneg (c - d),
    mul_self_nonneg (a + b), mul_self_nonneg (a + c), mul_self_nonneg (a + d),
    mul_self_nonneg (b + c), mul_self_nonneg (b + d), mul_self_nonneg (c + d)]

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat

  nlinarith [sq_nonneg (a - b), sq_nonneg (c - d), sq_nonneg (a + b), sq_nonneg (c + d),
    mul_self_nonneg (a - c), mul_self_nonneg (a - d), mul_self_nonneg (b - c),
    mul_self_nonneg (b - d), mul_self_nonneg (a + c), mul_self_nonneg (a + d),
    mul_self_nonneg (b + c), mul_self_nonneg (b + d)]

theorem AM_GM_inequality (a b c : ℝ) (ha : a > 0 ∧ b > 0 ∧ c > 0) (hab : a + b + c = 3) : a * b * c ≤ 1 := by
  have h : (a + b + c) ^ 3 ≥ 27 * (a * b * c) := by
    nlinarith [sq_nonneg (a - b), sq_nonneg (b - c), sq_nonneg (c - a)]
  rw [hab] at h
  linarith
